refnamediv.refpurpose: The file to output CSS to

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This parameter allows you to output the CSS to separate file which is referenced by each HTML file. If this parameter is blank, then the CSS is embedded inside a style tag in the HTML instead.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Outputs the CSS that controls the appearance of the entire document

listitem.para: Whether to create a CSS file when db2html.css.file is set.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template outputs a style or link tag and calls db2html.css.content to output the actual CSS directives. An external CSS file will only be created when css_file is true. This is only set to true by the top-level chunk to avoid creating the same file multiple times.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template is called by db2html.css to output CSS content. It also calls templates from other modules to output CSS specific to the content addressed in those modules.
This template calls db2html.css.custom at the end. That template may be used by extension stylesheets to extend or override the CSS.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Allows extension stylesheets to extend or override CSS

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This stub template has no content. Extension stylesheets can override this template to output extra CSS.
